descriptionHtml:
This standalone follower is made using CBBE
You can meet her at Whiterun - Temple of Kynareth
It is my first follower, so hope all works fine, if not - tell me. For me it works fine
Body and textures for the follower are included in mod, so you can use any other body mod.

Follower wears high heels so this mod requires:
[size=3][url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE 1.7.3+[/url][/size]
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/]RaceMenu 3.4.4+[/url][/size]
[size=4]or[/size]
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37481/]NetImmerse Override 3.4.4+[/url] for ECE/vanilla users
[/size]
Credits and mods used:
thanks to this tutorial and base .esp file to [b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/7106389]Skylaskyrim[/url][/b] https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/videos/5125/?

https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?   Brows
https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?   The Eyes Of Beauty
https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?    KS Hairdos - Renewal
https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?    SG Female Textures Renewal
https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?      Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE
https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/86647/?    Newmiller drake2 jewellery necklace UNP CBBE
https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81435/?    Vampire dark knight
and, if I remember well head:
https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7127/?     RANs HeadMesh Variants
PS. Yes, she is tall :)

PS2. Your screenshots will be greatly appreciated!
author: newmiller
